name: Rent Spent
description:
this is a windows only game

ALT+F4 to close (yes, we didn't make a quit button sorry)

Credits:

- Used a very small amount of code from a previous project
- music made in Musescore
- made using UnityEngine
- Benjamin Hines and Samuel Patterson were the primary contributors to the project.

Concept:

Rent Spent is a game where less is literally more. You trade your current stash of items, finding the best deals to get you more stuff, and paying off the ever increasing rent.
